Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.annotation

Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum AOP framework.

See: Description

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    After
    Indicates that the annotated advice is to be executed after a JoinPoint completes.
    Around
    Indicates that the annotated advice is to be executed around a JoinPoint.
    Aspect
    Separates cross-cutting concerns from core application code by providing pointcut advice.
    Before
    Indicates that the annotated advice is to be executed before a JoinPoint is invoked.
    Cache
    Indicates that the annotated method is eligible for caching, meaning subsequent invocations of a method for which the result has been cached, with the same arguments, will return the cached value without having to actually execute the method.
    EvictCache
    Indicates that the specified cache(s) will be evicted when the annotated method is invoked.

Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.annotation Description

Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum AOP framework.
